review: I liked this more than Chromecast (I have this, chromecast, roku 3 and WD TV). It's a pain to use my cell phone all the time to change things. For example, if I'm watching something and someone calls my cell phone... it's hard to pause and answer the call. This thing has a remote that works great. I hooked this thing up to my projector to get rid of the HDMI cables. Now I can watch movies and i don't have any cables going to my PC. I never had any issues with Hulu or Netflix. Definitely enjoyed this product. Good job, Amazon!
